body:
# About money claims

You can make a money claim if you think a person or organisation owes you money and will not pay you back.

[Find out how to make a new money claim](https://www.gov.uk/make-money-claim)

# When to use this service

Use this service if you have a query about a money claim of Â£10,000 or less which you've made against a person or organisation that owes you money, or which someone has made against you.
heading: Contact HMCTS about a court claim for money
lede: Use this service to contact HM Courts and Tribunals Service about a court claim for money.
